title: Construction of a large road infrastructure in a metropolitan area; what can the analysis of community complaints to noise tell us?

Author(s): Alexis Pinsonnault-Skvarenina, Véronique Guay, Renaud Leblanc-Guindon, Mathieu Carrier, Annelies Bockstael, Jean-Pierre Gagné, Tony Leroux
